verbose_text: Despite reported differences in gene expression patterns associated with blood samples collected in PAXgene and Tempus tubes--including interferon stimulated genes IFI44L and IFIT1 [XREF_BIBR]--our results demonstrate that the expression of six ISGs (IFI27, IFI44L, IFIT1, ISG15, RSAD2 and SIGLEC) and derived interferon scores are comparable in whole blood RNA obtained with PAXgene and Tempus isolation systems.
